org.eclipse.scada.configuration.world.osgi

Interface AbstractEventStorageJdbc

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApplicationConfiguration, ApplicationModule, EventStorage
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EventStorageJdbc, EventStoragePostgres
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEventStorageJdbcImpl, EventStorageJdbcImpl, EventStoragePostgresImpl

    public interface AbstractEventStorageJdbc
extends EventStorage
    A representation of the model object 'Abstract Event Storage Jdbc'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Jdbc Properties
    • Schema
    • Instance Name
    • Enable Replication
    • Archive Days
    • Cleanup Period Seconds

    See Also:
    OsgiPackage.getAbstractEventStorageJdbc()
